titles.title: A resolution to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of Jacob R. Kent, et al., v. R.L. Vallee, Inc., et al.
A resolution to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of Jacob R. Kent, et al., v. R.L. Vallee, Inc., et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: Authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Sanders' office and Daniel McLean, an employee in such office, in the case of Jacob R. Kent, et al., v. R.L. Vallee, Inc., et al. and in all proceedings related to it.
